document.full_text: street fighting raged in yemen's capital on tuesday ending a tenuous ceasefire between tribal groups and forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh and edging the impoverished arab state closer to civil war.
document.title: yemen truce ends in blasts, stokes civil war worries
lines_and_colors: street fighting raged in yemen's capital on tuesday ending a tenuous ceasefire between tribal groups and forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh and edging the impoverished arab state closer to civil war.
